arts.ttl: Athletic Club to be without key man for Newcastle United as crisis deepens
arts.sum: Things continue to go from bad to worse for Athletic Club, as they prepare for their Champions League clash with Newcastle United at St. James Park. Los Leones are due to travel to England today for a 21:00 CEST kick-off on Wednesday night.
